fields.text: Part C: Household Summary Information
* Please Use Household Member Form for Household Summary Information
Part D.1: Other Housesehold Member VCA Sub Populations 0-17 years

fields.label: Do all the siblings/other household members 0-17 years know their HIV status?

fields.text: Please Offer HIV index testing/collect DBS if VCA is HEI as part of enrollment for children/adolescents with unknown status
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Are there children/Adolescents in the Household who are HIV Positive?

fields.text: Categorize as an index C/ALHIV VCA
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Are the HIV Positive Children/Adolescents in the Household Active on Treatment?

fields.text: Refer to treatment and care as part of enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Is the female caregiver HIV-positive (WLHIV)?
Do all the biological children 0-17 years of the Caregiver know their HIV status?

fields.text: Offer index testing as part of enrollment for all biological children 0-17 years and DBS for all HEIs
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: If other household member 0-2 years is HEI, are they receiving breastfeeding?
Is breastfeeding HEI receiving HIV testing and drugs to prevent HIV transmission and other infections in line with guidelines

fields.text: Refer and provide preventive care and support services as part of enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.text: Categorize as HEI VCA
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: If there are children in the household aged 0-5 years, are they enrolled in an Early Childhood Development Program and are their developmental milestones tracked?

fields.text: Refer to ECD Services at Enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Have all children and adolescents in the household been screened for malnutrition?

fields.text: Refer children and adolescents for nutrition screening or screen using mid upper arm circumference and refer malnourished children to therapeutic and supplementary feeding and offer the household nutrition counseling
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Are there household members 0-17years that are victims of Sexual Violence
Have the victims of Sexual Violence received clinical care(PEP, HIV testing, emergency contraceptive, STI testing, psychosocial counseling)

fields.text: Categorize as Victim of Sexual Violence VCA. Refer to appropriate clinical services as part of enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Have the victims of Sexual Violence received non-clinical care (legal services)

fields.text: Categorize as Victim of Sexual Violence VCA. Refer to appropriate non-clinical services as part of enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Are the VCAs in the household receiving age-appropriate HIV and sexual violence preventive interventions

fields.text: Refer household to age-appropriate interventions at enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.label: Have all the male HIV-negative VCA in the household 15 years and above received voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC)?

fields.text: Refer to VMMC services at enrollment
fields.toaster_info_text: This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note, This is an information note,This is an information note, This is an information note

fields.text: Part D.2: Adolescent Girls & Young Women (AGYW) 10-17 Years
* Please Use Household Member Form for AGYW Screening.
Part E: For Primary Caregivers Only

fields.label: Have you experienced violence in the home in the last six months?
Have the children experienced violence in the home in the last six months??
What is your HIV Status?
Are you active on treatment?

fields.text: Refer to appropriate treatment and care services as part of enrollment
